RoomDescription: You stand in a large hall full of weary travellers. Magnificent painted scenes of a seafaring culture line the walls, and clerks move around with large stacks of documents. A pudgy man with a monacle and greasy hair beckons to all new arrivals..
RoomNewbieTips: Here you meet the first NPC you need to interact with.  To get started you'll need to hail him using the [b]Hail[/b] command (i.e. [b]hail Pudgy Clerk[/b] or [b]h clerk[/b]) and he'll help you set your name in the world ... as he asks you questions simply reply with the "<shortcut>" presented in the questions i.e. "y" to say yes.  He'll ask you other questions that don't have a shortcut code that you can just type the answer to (like when he asks for your name). [To disable tips type "newbietips off"]
